div.bibl: Die Abendpost, November 15, 1894. A NEW INVENTION

body.p: Peter Sauer, a young German electrician, who came two years ago to this country, succeeded in inventing a new powerful electric searchlight. The latter is of the greatest importance for use on warships. For this reason the American government has reserved itself the right to buy the patent from Peter Saner, who is living 3337 Hoyne Avenue.
The young inventor is at present with his lawyer in Washington to complete the deal with the Federal Government.
